header.title: Privacy Policy: Your Data, Your Trust
header.text: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

sidebar.title: Introduction
sidebar.text: Please take a moment to read through these terms to understand your rights and responsibilities.

content.title: Overview
text: ${companyName} ("we," "our," and/or "us") value the privacy of individuals who use our website, mobile applications ("Apps"), and related services (collectively, our "Services"). This privacy policy (the "Privacy Policy") explains how we collect, use, and share information from users of our Services ("Users") to improve the gaming experience.
For users of our Apps that are part of Apple Arcade, please refer to the "Apple Arcade" section below.

By using our Services, you agree to the collection, use, disclosure, and procedures this Privacy Policy describes. Beyond this Privacy Policy, your use of our Services is subject to our Terms of Service.

sidebar.title: Information Collection
sidebar.text: Understanding what information we collect and how we use it.

content.title: Information You Provide Us
text: We may collect a variety of information from or about you or your devices from various sources, as described below.
If you do not provide your information as requested, you may not be able to use our Services if that information is necessary to provide our Services or we are legally required to collect it.

content.title: Registration and Profile
text: If you link our Services to a third party account, such as a Game Center, Google Play, or Facebook account, we may receive information about you from these third party services such as your email address, profile information, and friends list.
If you wish to limit the information these third parties make available to us, we encourage you to visit the privacy settings for those third party accounts to learn about your options.

sidebar.title: Information Usage
sidebar.text: How we use the information we collect from you.

content.title: How We Use Your Information
text: To provide, maintain, improve, and enhance our Services
To personalize your experience on our Services
To understand and analyze how you use our Services
To communicate with you and provide customer support
To facilitate transactions and payments
For marketing and advertising purposes
To find and prevent fraud
For compliance purposes

sidebar.title: Information Sharing
sidebar.text: How we share your information with third parties.

content.title: How We Share Your Information
text: With service providers and partners who assist in operating our Services
When required by law or to protect rights
In connection with a business transaction
With your consent or at your direction

sidebar.title: Data Protection
sidebar.text: How we protect your information and keep it secure.

content.title: Security Measures
text: We make reasonable efforts to protect your information by using physical and electronic safeguards designed to improve the security of the information we maintain. However, as our Services are hosted electronically, we can make no guarantees as to the security or privacy of your information.

sidebar.title: Children's Privacy
sidebar.text: How we handle information from children.

content.title: Children Under 13
text: No part of our Services is directed to children, and we do not knowingly collect, maintain, or use personal information from children under 13 years of age. If you learn that a child has provided us with personal information in violation of this Privacy Policy, then you may alert us at ${companyEmail}.

sidebar.title: International Users
sidebar.text: Information for users outside the United States.

content.title: International Data Transfers
text: Our Services are hosted in the United States. If you choose to use our Services from other regions of the world, please note that you are transferring your personal information outside of those regions to the United States for storage and processing.

sidebar.title: Your Rights
sidebar.text: Understanding your privacy rights and choices.

content.title: Your Privacy Rights
text: You can update your account and profile information through your profile settings.
You can request the deletion of your personal information by submitting a request to ${companyEmail}.
You can ask us to restrict the processing of your personal information by submitting a request to ${companyEmail}.

sidebar.title: Contact Information
sidebar.text: How to reach us with privacy questions.

content.title: Contact Us
text: ${companyName} is responsible for processing your information. If you have any questions, comments, or concerns about our processing activities, please email us at ${companyEmail} or write to us at ${companyAddress}.
